attributes.comment:
My wife and I are one of several families in our area currently seeking to adopt
orphans out of Ethiopia. It has been a challenge for us to come up with all the
funds we need. We have been looking into grants and scholarships to help us
raise the money.

We were deeply troubled to hear that your agency is going to make it EVEN
MORE difficult on us and many others who aren't loaded with money as we seek
to help these children. We are even going to be adopting an older child (13 years
old) because they are basically unadoptable after age 7. I would hate to think that
some of them might not get homes due to the "system" in a wealthy country
making it more difficult for families to get them.

Please reconsider your intention to raise the fees associated with adoption from
outside the U.S.

Sincerely,
James C. Beam, Jr.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by James Beam Jr.
